 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלַל‎</span>] **verb** ==draw out== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***draw***, especially sword from scabbard, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***drawn sword, new-born child*** (compare [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>75</sup>, but also [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Hom. Wurz. 80 f.</sup>); Talmud <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלִיל‎</span>, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלִילָא‎</span> ***embryo*** or ***abortion***); — ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine plural + ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁלתָּֿשֹׁלוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָהּ מִן וגו‎</span> [[Ruth.2.16|Ruth 2:16]] ***ye shall by all means draw out for her*** from the sheaves. 

 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלַל‎</span> **verb** ==spoil, plunder== (usually identification with I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span>; Late Hebrew ***id.*** ([[BDB#Jastr|Jastr]], compare [[BDB#Dalm|Dalm]]); Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šalâlu, id.;***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chr 33</sup> compare Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַלל‎</span> ***plunder***, connecting this with Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***a flock of sheep*** (or ***goats***); then [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלָלָא‎</span> ***booty***, and (rare) Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> are loan-words); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשׁ‎</span> [[Ezek.26.12|Ezek 26:12]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁלּוֺתָ‎</span> [[Hab.2.8|Hab 2:8]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשָׁלּוּךָ‎</span> v[[Hab.2.8|Hab 2:8]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִשְׁלֹ‎</span> [[Isa.10.6|Isa 10:6]] +; ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁלְלִים‎</span> [[Zech.2.12|Zech 2:12]], etc.; — ***spoil, plunder*** (usually \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּזַז‎</span>), with accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלָל‎</span> [[Isa.10.6|Isa 10:6]]; [[Ezek.29.19|Ezek 29:19]]; [[Ezek.38.12|Ezek 38:12]]; [[Ezek.38.13|Ezek 38:13]] (twice in verse), accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַיִל‎</span> ***wealth*** [[Ezek.26.12|Ezek 26:12]] accusative of person, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁלְלִים‎</span> [[Jer.50.10|Jer 50:10]]; [[Hab.2.8|Hab 2:8]]; [[Ezek.39.10|Ezek 39:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גּוֺיִם רַבּים‎</span> [[Hab.2.8|Hab 2:8]], compare [[Zech.2.12|Zech 2:12]]. **Hithpo\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶשְׁתּוֺלְלוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַבִּירֵי לֵב‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶשְׁתּ‎</span> is Aramaic, or scribal error: [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:54a»§ 54a</sup> ***n.***, compare 58 k) [[Ps.76.6|Ps 76:6]] ***the stout of heart are spoiled***; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְׁתּוֺלֵל‎</span> [[Isa.59.15|Isa 59:15]] he that departs from evil ***is one despoiled.***
